product_description: Ultralightweight and built for supreme comfort, a svelte slip-on sneaker sits atop a molded rubber sole and Easy Spirit's Evolve footbed.
product_details_and_care:
Ultralightweight and built for supreme comfort, a svelte slip-on sneaker sits atop a molded rubber sole and Easy Spirit's Evolve footbed. Evolve technology combines the brand's Easy Support System with signature All-Encompassing Comfort (e360) system Anti-Gravity technology, creating an engineered footbed that offers enhanced energy return, responsive cushioning and lasting comfort without adding weight or bulk.
1 3/4" heel
Elastic goring
Removable, cushioned insole with arch support
Leather upper/textile lining/synthetic sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #6024045
